feature.label: Bioclipse OpenTox
feature.description: Interacting with OpenTox services (www.opentox.org). Includes e.g. functionality to create/upload/download/search for chemical structures (including chemical and biological properties), datasets, and models to predict toxicological properties.
feature.license: This feature and the accompanying materials are made available under the terms of the Eclipse Public License v1.0 + exception, putting no constraints on choice of backend and/or license for creating plugins for Bioclipse; it is totally open for both open source plugins as well as commercial.
